Title: The Ugly Duckling and Me!
Writer: Hans Christian Andersen (fairytale), Michael Hegner (story), Mark Hodkinson (screenplay), Mark Hodkinson (story), Karsten Kiilerich (story)
Actors: Morgan C. Jones, Paul Tylak, Anna Nugent, Gary Hetzler
Plot: This modern version of Hans Christian Andersen's fairytale is charming. Ratso is a streetwise chancer of a rat whose theatre show is struggling. Then he finds an egg that hatches a mutant swan. Ratso soon sees the potential of showing Ugly as a freak. But things go awry when rodent heavies appear...
